name: Service
text: [§641-15]  Service.  Service of a copy of the notice of appeal shall be made upon the adverse party or the adverse party's attorney of record as provided by the rules of court. [L 1892, c 95, pt of §8; am L 1919, c 44, §7; RL 1925, §2530; RL 1935, §3557; RL 1945, §9558; RL 1955, §212-8; HRS §641-18; am L 1972, c 89, pt of §5; ren HRS §641-15; gen ch 1985]
